pullrequest.title: create an AtlasStates.msg aggregating all information in sensor_msgs/JointState sensor_msgs/Imu and atlas_msgs/ForceTorqueSensors so data are synchronized in a single publish.

content.raw: Suggest changing `AtlasStates.msg` to `AtlasState.msg`, as each instance of that type of message contains a single state (though multi-variate) value for all of Atlas.
content.html: Suggest changing AtlasStates.msg to AtlasState.msg, as each instance of that type of message contains a single state (though multi-variate) value for all of Atlas.
